profileAlternative.name: Sanchit Suman
profileAlternative.headline: Data Science Analyst at Apple | Strategic Data Solutions
profileAlternative.summary:
• Data Analytics professional with over 5 years of experience
• 3 years of experience in Consumer Banking analytics and MIS.
• Good interpersonal and presentation skills with ability to work in a team and also drive engagements.
• Innovative thinker with passion and determination to approach challenging assignments.
• Comprehensive experience in designing information insights, management information systems, analytical solutions and working with multiple teams.

educations.title: Carnegie Mellon University - Heinz College of Information Systems and Public Policy

given.text:
Sanchit has been a key individual in the data management team at Citicorp India, assisting and heading processes while ensuring exceptional quality delivery. Sanchit has profound knowledge of the area combined with result-driven management skills. He has proven himself to be truly a recognised authority in the area of data management.

He is a good organiser giving attention to minute details and has a clear vision. He is not only a sincere and hardworking worker but also a warm friendly person. See less

I worked with Sanchit on so many projects in Citi. He is a results-driven, energetic individual with strong technical and process knowledge. He is a natural performer who had the ability to scale up and meet project expectations with ease and is noted for his strong communication and collaboration style. He has excellent collobration skills and solid experience of leading the engagements with a consistent record of creating value for clients. I wish him all the best for his bright future. Good Luck See less

received.text:
I have had the pleasure to work with Garima in my time at Citi. She has demonstrated exceptional ability to work in a team and contribute towards a common goal. He strong communication skills and dedication to learn make her a valuable asset in any team. She has shown immense patience in working on complex deliverables and has been able to build upon her experiences.

She has always been receptive to positive feedback and has conducted herself in the most professional manner. Her genial nature and supportive attitude make her and important and critical colleague at any work place.

... See more
